name: Naftogaz of Ukraine
goal: Naftogaz is the national oil and gas company of Ukraine. It is a state-owned company subordinated to the Cabinet of Ministers of Ukraine. The company is involved with extraction, transportation, and refinement of natural gas and crude oil.
interests: Competition, Energy, Internal Market, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
Energy Union
Third Energy Package
Infrastructure integration
Security of Gas Supply
Gas Directive
Clean Energy Package
